annotations.normalized_text: Swine Flu the USA Swine Flu

text: @TuckerCarlson WHY are you determined to call this China Coronavirus and never pushed to call the Swine Flu the USA Swine Flu?! Same situation but Swine came from DIRECTLY from the USA!! 🤔
